+ Guests will be able to view store menus via the VIEW MENU button on each location’s homepage
+ Guests will receive updated Waitlist confirmation details featuring our Text to Page program

+ Guests will be able to view store menus via the VIEW MENU button on each location’s homepage

New ordering and waitlist experience!

Favorite locations and orders for quick reordering and getting on the waitlist.

Use your Texas Roadhouse Gift Card to pay for TO-GO orders.

Redeem VIP Offers.

Join the Waitlist and use our new text system to let us know when you’ve arrived. We’ll text when your table is ready.

View your favorite location’s menu handsfree.
